actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to authorize certain civilian employees of the Department of Defense who perform police or security functions at the Philadelphia Quartermasters Depot in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to make arrests for violations of law occurring on that installation.

summary.text: Empowers Department of Defense employees performing police security functions at the Defense Personnel Support Center of the Defense Logistics Agency at the Philadelphia Quartermasters Depot in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to make arrests on such installation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain civilian employees of the Department of Defense who perform police or security functions at the Philadelphia Quartermasters Depot in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to make arrests for violations of law occurring on that installation.
